overview: From student filmmaker Roman Natale comes a cautionary tale of a group of teenage boys who form a club where they think of ideas to do the worst things possible without getting caught. If you get caught, you're kicked from the club. We follow Julian, the creator and leader of the club, with his fellow club members Luke, Nick, Shawn, and Bruce.
tagline: Do you know what JUG stands for?
title: Justice Under God
